description:
- PRIVATE 38SQM WRAP AROUND COURTYARD
- RENT POTENTIAL: APPROX. $525-$575 PW UF
- LOCATED IN A BOUTIQUE COMPLEX OF ONLY 12
- PERMIT PARKING AVAILABLE FOR 2ND CAR!

Experience the very best of inner-city living with this spectacular 3-bedroom Bronte Street apartment. Situated in a small and quiet boutique complex of just 12, yet perfectly positioned to take advantage of everything Perth and East Perth has to offer.

The apartment features 3 large bedrooms with built in robes, 2 bathrooms including ensuite off the master bedroom, huge open plan kitchen and living with gas cooktop and striking polished floorboards throughout. With a huge 38sqm wrap around courtyard and lock up garage with direct access to the apartment, you don’t want to miss out on the opportunity to secure this inner-city gem!

Positioned only moments away from East Perth’s Royal Street and Claisebrook Cove, residents are spoiled for choice with a vast variety of cafés and restaurants to choose from. With the ability to walk along the picturesque Swan River, through the Victoria Gardens or easily to a football game at Optus Stadium, catch a free CAT bus to the CBD and access the best of the city and Northbridge, this location provides absolute convenience.

Furthermore, the Perth Girls School site development discussions are well underway with some significant and exciting social and cultural plans being proposed. The proposal includes but is not limited to a shopping complex with major supermarket, restaurant/cafes, art gallery, yoga studio, cultural center, and microbrewery. Click the link below for more information on this exciting East Perth development. https://www.perthnow.com.au/local-news/perthnow-central/east-perth-four-towers-microbrewery-and-supermarket-proposed-for-perth-girls-school-site-c-5737166

Grab this scarce opportunity with both hands as a property possessing this quality won't last long!

Features:
- 99sqm internal including garage
- 38sqm wrap around courtyard
- 2sqm storeroom
- Large kitchen with plenty of cupboard space
- Three large bedrooms with built in robes
- Ensuite bathroom in master bedroom
- Gas cooking
- Split system air-conditioning
- Boutique complex of 12
- Pool and spa
- Permit parking available on Bronte Street
- CBD is accessible in minutes
- 400m to Wellington Square
- 4.9km to Crown Towers
- Walking distance from some of Perth and East Perth’s most popular bars and restaurants

Approximate Outgoings:
Strata Admin Levy: $1,116 p/q
Strata Reserve Levy: $55.80 p/q
Water Rates: $1,925.91 p/a
Council Rates: $1,675 p/a

For further information or to book in an inspection, please contact Josh Roberts on 0403 879 855 or email at jroberts@arenare.com.au
